name: Form Status Tweaks
description: Specify alternative text to be used in place of the standard Incomplete/Unverified/Complete form status labels.

system-settings.name: Note: these settings will take effect for all projects where the module is enabled. Will you enable it for all projects?

System-wide default label for "Incomplete" form status
Leave empty to use default label (i.e. "Incomplete").

System-wide default label for "Unverified" form status
Leave empty to use default label (i.e. "Unverified").

System-wide default label for "Complete" form status
Leave empty to use default label (i.e. "Complete").
